entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:34 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25 with temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:34 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
